list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an implement with a handle, consisting of bristles, hair, or wire set into a block, used for cleaning or scrubbing, applying a liquid or powder to a surface, arranging the hair, or other purposes.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the lightest brush of his lips against her cheek
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: bàn chải nhẹ nhất của đôi môi của mình chống lại má cô ấy

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the bushy tail of a fox.
a thin stick set with long wire bristles, used to make a soft hissing sound on drums or cymbals.
a piece of carbon or metal serving as an electrical contact with a moving part in a motor or alternator.
remove (dust or dirt) by sweeping or scrubbing.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: we'll be able to brush the mud off easily
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: chúng ta sẽ có thể chải bùn dễ dàng

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: their fingers brushed as she took the glass from him
